forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind around 13 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 10 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
As the gentle hours of the night draw to a close, Downtown San Francisco is enveloped in a calming embrace of clouds, with the temperature resting comfortably around 54. The wind whispers softly from the west-southwest, offering a touch of coolness that is both refreshing and invigorating. 

When dawn breaks, the city will shake off its slumber to reveal a mostly sunny day, with the sunlight casting a warm glow over the streets. The forecast suggests a gentle rise to the high 60s by midday, though the afternoon may see temperatures sliding a little lower as the winds pick up, rustling through the trees and fluttering the leaves. It is likely that a shallow marine layer will linger along the edges of the city, lending a delightful mystique to the iconic Golden Gate Bridge, perhaps shrouded in a light veil as the day progresses. Those venturing out may find the air crisp and clean, inviting a brisk walk or a leisurely café visit. Dressing in layers will be wise; a light jacket or a cozy sweater will offer comfort against the winds that may stir throughout the day. Consider exploring the charms of the Mission District or settling into a quiet nook of a favorite bookstore. With the spirit of a Saturday unfolding auspiciously, there's much to discover in this vibrant city alive with possibilities.
